name: Direct URL(s) for scraping specific video(s)
description: Add the URLs of posted videos you want to scrape. You can enter URLs one by one, or you can upload or link to a text file.

name: Should download videos
description: Whether to download TikTok video files. Note that this will increase costs and time required for the scrape

name: Should download video covers (thumbnails)
description: Whether to download TikTok video cover images (i.e. thumbnails). Note that this will increase costs and time required for the scrape

name: Should download slideshow images
description: Whether to download TikTok slideshow images. Note that this will increase costs and time required for the scrape

name: Video Download Key-Value Store ID or Name
description: Name (or ID) of the Key Value Store where the videos will be stored. Omit to store in the default one.
